txt.en: 'The trees of the grove must be protected from the corruption of these dark days.'
'These are difficult times for all the people of Middle-earth.'
'Use caution when you leave this place. There is much evil in the world.'
'We are permitted to take older trees from the grove for our ships.'
'I have heard CÃ­rdan obtained permission to use this wood, but I do not know the details.'
'I have chosen to remain in Middle-earth for a time. There is much I still must do.'
'We have such a great need for Elven-ships. I hope there will be enough.'
'Many of my friends have already left Middle-earth. I will join them when my work is done.'
'If you can look past the corruption, the beauty of the land is still there to be seen.'
'Our labours here are long, but this work is important to all the Elves.'
